ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster veered hard, turning his trailer sideways, giving Triggerhappy cover with it, (its not in front of him like a shield. Wildrider saw Prowl spinning

Subject: Re: War and Peace
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster veered hard, turning his trailer sideways, giving Triggerhappy
cover with it, (its not in front of him like a shield. Wildrider saw Prowl
spinning out of control, and new it was time to move in for the kill. This
time he drove straight into Motormaster, and used him like a ramp to send
him into the air at 250mph, straight towards Prowl, "ha ha ha, youre mine
now" he screamed.
